attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law so that when taxpayer pounds are used to compensate individuals for unlawful activity against them, such as the recent case where a military lawyer was compensated by the taxpayer funded Ministry of Defence in a settlement before the case came to court, it will be illegal for the full amount paid not immediately to be made known to the people who pay for it - the taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When civil servants and politicians are giving away taxpayer pounds to compensate individuals for their or other taxpayer funded unlawful activities then the amount awarded should NOT be kept secret.  When the individuals who are acting in such a manner as to cause these cases to come up start paying for their activities out of their own pocket, then they can keep the amounts awarded secret. Until that day arrives the taxpayer has a basic human right to know what his or her taxes are being used to pay for.
